overview_of_class: The purpose of this course is to familiarize participants with the major texts which define the Arthurian tradition and to trace the development of a major Arthurian theme, the Holy Grail, from their medieval origins to their manifestations in modern media, culture and literature. There are no language prerequisites. All readings will be done in modern English. Participants should have completed an introductory level course (or have competencies in) literature and expository writing based on research. This course meets pre-1798 requirement for majors.
name: Studies in Medieval Literature:
subject: ENGLISH
